sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-INSURANCE-CONTACT-LETTER-INSERT*/ INTO insurance_contact_letter(letter_id,bill_no,customer_user_id,customer_user_name,customer_cert_type,customer_cert_no,customer_user_phone,customer_user_type,customer_user_sex,customer_user_address,customer_user_birth,business_user_id,business_user_name,department,company_user_id,company_user_name,price_contact_id,price_contact_name,price_contact_no,project_setup_id,project_setup_name,project,beginDate,endDate,form_id,status,is_invoice,remark,recipients,company,address,mobile,type,is_quota,insurance_type,product_id,product_name,product_level_id,product_level_level,premium_amount,is_car_sales,plate_number,guarantee_period,creator_id,creator_name,raw_add_time) VALUES (#letterId#,#billNo#,#customerUserId#,#customerUserName#,#customerCertType#,#customerCertNo#,#customerUserPhone#,#customerUserType#,#customerUserSex#,#customerUserAddress#,#customerUserBirth#,#businessUserId#,#businessUserName#,#department#,#companyUserId#,#companyUserName#,#priceContactId#,#priceContactName#,#priceContactNo#,#projectSetupId#,#projectSetupName#,#project#,#beginDate#,#endDate#,#formId#,#status#,#isInvoice#,#remark#,#recipients#,#company#,#address#,#mobile#,#type#,#isQuota#,#insuranceType#,#productId#,#productName#,#productLevelId#,#productLevelLevel#,#premiumAmount#,#isCarSales#,#plateNumber#,#guaranteePeriod#,#creatorId#,#creatorName#,#rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-INSURANCE-CONTACT-LETTER-UPDATE*/ insurance_contact_letter set customer_user_id=#customerUserId#, customer_user_name=#customerUserName#, customer_cert_type=#customerCertType#, customer_cert_no=#customerCertNo#, customer_user_phone=#customerUserPhone#, customer_user_type=#customerUserType#, customer_user_sex=#customerUserSex#, customer_user_address=#customerUserAddress#, customer_user_birth=#customerUserBirth#, business_user_id=#businessUserId#, business_user_name=#businessUserName#, department=#department#, company_user_id=#companyUserId#, company_user_name=#companyUserName#, price_contact_id=#priceContactId#, price_contact_name=#priceContactName#, price_contact_no=#priceContactNo#, project_setup_id=#projectSetupId#, project_setup_name=#projectSetupName#, project=#project#, beginDate=#beginDate#, endDate=#endDate#, form_id=#formId#, status=#status#, is_invoice=#isInvoice#, remark=#remark#, recipients=#recipients#, company=#company#, address=#address#, mobile=#mobile#, type=#type#, is_quota=#isQuota#, insurance_type=#insuranceType#, product_id=#productId#, product_name=#productName#, product_level_id=#productLevelId#, product_level_level=#productLevelLevel#, premium_amount=#premiumAmount.cent#, is_car_sales=#isCarSales#, plate_number=#plateNumber#, guarantee_period=#guaranteePeriod#, creator_id=#creatorId#, creator_name=#creatorName# where (letter_id = #letterId#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-INSURANCE-CONTACT-LETTER-FIND-BY-ID*/ letter_id, bill_no, customer_user_id, customer_user_name, customer_cert_type, customer_cert_no, customer_user_phone, customer_user_type, customer_user_sex, customer_user_address, customer_user_birth, business_user_id, business_user_name, department, company_user_id, company_user_name, price_contact_id, price_contact_name, price_contact_no, project_setup_id, project_setup_name, project, beginDate, endDate, form_id, status, is_invoice, remark, recipients, company, address, mobile, type, is_quota, insurance_type, product_id, product_name, product_level_id, product_level_level, premium_amount, is_car_sales, plate_number, guarantee_period, creator_id, creator_name, raw_add_time, raw_update_time from insurance_contact_letter where (letter_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-INSURANCE-CONTACT-LETTER-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ letter_id ,bill_no,customer_user_id ,customer_user_name ,customer_cert_type,customer_cert_no,customer_user_phone ,customer_user_type ,customer_user_sex,customer_user_address,customer_user_birth,business_user_id,business_user_name,department,company_user_id ,company_user_name ,price_contact_id ,price_contact_name ,price_contact_no ,project_setup_id ,project_setup_name ,project ,beginDate ,endDate ,form_id ,status ,is_invoice ,remark ,recipients ,company ,address ,mobile ,type ,is_quota ,insurance_type ,product_id ,product_name ,product_level_id ,product_level_level ,premium_amount ,is_car_sales,plate_number,guarantee_period ,creator_id ,creator_name ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM insurance_contact_letter where 1=1
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

select /*MS-YRD-INSURANCE-CONTACT-LETTER-FIND-BY-FORM-ID*/ letter_id, bill_no, customer_user_id, customer_user_name, customer_cert_type, customer_cert_no, customer_user_phone, customer_user_type, customer_user_sex, customer_user_address, customer_user_birth, business_user_id, business_user_name, department, company_user_id, company_user_name, price_contact_id, price_contact_name, price_contact_no, project_setup_id, project_setup_name, project, beginDate, endDate, form_id, status, is_invoice, remark, recipients, company, address, mobile, type, is_quota, insurance_type, product_id, product_name, product_level_id, product_level_level, premium_amount, is_car_sales, plate_number, guarantee_period, creator_id, creator_name, raw_add_time, raw_update_time from insurance_contact_letter where (form_id = #value#)
